Package jetbrains.mps.smodel.runtime

Interface ILanguageAspect

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AspectExtensionsAware, BehaviorAspectDescriptor, ConceptPresentationAspect, ConstraintsAspectDescriptor, DataFlowAspectDescriptor, FeedbackAspect, FindUsageAspectDescriptor, IHelginsDescriptor, MakeAspectDescriptor, MigrationAspectDescriptor, RefactoringAspect, RulesConstraintsAspect, ScriptAspectDescriptor, StructureAspectDescriptor, TextGenAspectDescriptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseBehaviorAspectDescriptor, BaseConstraintsAspectDescriptor, BaseFindUsagesDescriptor, BaseHelginsDescriptor, BaseStructureAspectDescriptor, CombinedFeedbackAspect, ConceptPresentationAspectBase, ConstraintsAspectInterpreted, DataFlowAspectDescriptorBase, FacetAspectDescriptor, RefactoringAspectBase, ScriptAspectBase, TextGenAspectBase
    public interface ILanguageAspect
    Marker for a language extension, known as 'Language Aspect'.
    See Also:
    LanguageRuntime.getAspect(Class)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void dispose()
      Invoked by LanguageRuntime once it's no longer in use.

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        default void dispose()
        Invoked by LanguageRuntime once it's no longer in use. Intended to perform cleanup of internal caches only. Aspect implementation shall not access another aspect of the language here; moreover, generally shall not query any external service that could be unavailable the moment languages get disposed. Note, aspect instances get disposed in no particular order.
